nl.strohalm.cyclos.utils.cache

Interface Cache

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    EhCacheCache

    public interface Cache
    Defines the API to access cached items
    Author:
    luis

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean addListener(CacheListener listener)
      Adds a cache listener for the given scope, if it was not yet registered
      void clear()
      Removes all cached elements
      <T> T get(java.io.Serializable key, CacheCallback callback)
      Returns an element from cache, given the key.
      java.lang.String getName()
      Returns the name of this cache
      <T> T remove(java.io.Serializable key)
      Removes an item from the cache
      void shutdown()
      Shuts down the given cache, making it invalid to invoke any other method after this invocation

    • Method Detail

      • addListener

        boolean addListener(CacheListener listener)
        Adds a cache listener for the given scope, if it was not yet registered

      • clear

        void clear()
        Removes all cached elements

      • get

        <T> T get(java.io.Serializable key,
        CacheCallback callback)
        Returns an element from cache, given the key. If the object is not present, the callback will be invoked, returning adding the returned object to cache and returning it

      • getName

        java.lang.String getName()
        Returns the name of this cache

      • remove

        <T> T remove(java.io.Serializable key)
        Removes an item from the cache

      • shutdown

        void shutdown()
        Shuts down the given cache, making it invalid to invoke any other method after this invocation
